name: indifferently
content:
indifferently adverb
(WITHOUT INTEREST)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you are not thinking about or interested in someone or something: She shrugged indifferently. People stare indifferently from doorways. See
indifferent
More examplesFewer examples"You can stay if you like," she says indifferently. Older people treat outsiders indifferently while the children seem awestruck by them. The Maryland fans charged the field and never treated him indifferently again.
